data.name: Finding America: The Heartland
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to America's Heartland! From the monumental Mount Rushmore of South Dakota to the humble farmhouses of Kansas, we're confident this lovely slice of American pie will have something just for you. Now let's go see the many beautiful things the Heartland has to offer!

30 Hidden Object scenes, with 2 mini-Hidden Object scenes each
54 minigames
54 chapters

Strap on your seatbelts, because we're going on a trip to America's Heartland! This isn't any ordinary road trip, though: every sight and scene — from Illinois' jazz bars to Wisconsin's cheese shops to Ohio's national parks — comes in the form of lovingly crafted Hidden Object Scenes and Minigames! Complete each chapter, unlock tons of different trivia, and enjoy everything the Heartland has to offer in this all-American Hidden Object game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 1GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible
